title: Check, change or cancel your instructor theory test

details.description: Check, change or cancel your approved driving instructor (ADI), large goods vehicle instructor (LGV) or register of post-test motorcycle trainers theory test
details.more_information:
You'll need your driving licence number.

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.

^ There's a different process to [check, change or cancel your instructor theory test](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/how-to-become-an-approved-driving-instructor-_adi_ "Check, change or cancel your instructor theory test"){:rel="external"}  in Northern Ireland. ^

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
details.introduction:
Check, change or cancel your approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 test, large goods vehicle (LGV) instructor or a register of post-test motorcycle trainers (RPMT) theory test.

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
*[RPMT]: Register of post-test motorcycle trainers
*[LGV]: Large goods vehicle
details.alternate_methods:
##Check, change or cancel by phone

You can check, change or cancel your instructor theory test by calling the DSA helpline.

$C
**DSA theory test helpline**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm
$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
